profile.greeting: Welcome {{user_first_name}}! I'm Kingsley, click get started to receive useful tips for your interview and resume.

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! I'm Kingsley, I'll be giving you amazing tips for your interview or resume.
get_started.guidance: Navigate with the options below. At anytime, type menu to return here

leadgen.promo: Hi {{userFirstName}}, finding great outfits is now easier and more convenient.
leadgen.title: 50% Coupon
leadgen.subtitle: Here is your coupon
leadgen.coupon: Added your coupon to this thread, you can now check out the discounted summer collection

curation.prompt: Are you looking for an outfit for yourself or someone else?
curation.occasion: Great! Let's get started. First, is there an occasion in mind?
curation.price: How much are you looking to spend?
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit
curation.interviewintro: Let's get started on interview questions and tips to answer them
curation.tellusaboutyourself: When interviewer ask: Tell me a little about yourself, what should you describe?
curation.tellusaboutyourselfcorrect: 😀😀 Well done, that was a great answer
curation.tellusaboutyourselfwrong: Sorry 😧 😧, that's not the best answer. It's better to describe mostly your professional side
curation.tellusaboutyourselfseeexample: Do you want to see an example
curation.tellusaboutyourselfexample: Start out with an overview of your current position, then provide relevant highlights that make you qualified for the 👍
curation.whyworkhere: When the interviewer asks why you want to work for them
curation.whyworkhereexample: Both options were actually correct 😉. Prepare for this question by doing your homework and mentinoning the appealing aspects in your answer.
curation.eyecontact: Should you maintain good eye contact?
curation.eyecontactwhy: You should, the eyes acts as a window to your interest level and confidence
curation.resumeintro: Let's jump right into some tips
curation.resumeshort: Make your resume simple and easy to read.
curation.resumeshortexplanation: It makes it easier for employers, it's more inviting to read 👍👍
curation.resumemeasureexplanation: Employers are responsive to measurable proven value, so add if possible
curation.resumefont: Use a professional font. What size though?
curation.resumefontwrong: 😧 Not really, it's best to use font size 10-12 as it makes your resume more readable
curation.jobsuggestionintro: Let us help you decide which career is best for you
curation.jobsuggestioninstruction: Answere these quick questions to know the right career for you
curation.jobresult147: You are a thinker. Ideal for careers with strategy and problem solving.
curation.jobresult148: You are a builder, good with your hands. Good for careers that require skillful movement and rapid growth
curation.jobresult149: You are a builder, good with your hands. Good for careers that require skillful movement and rapid growth

order.prompt: We'll be happy to help you. Select from the following
order.number: Sure, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

care.prompt: To connect you with the right team please let me know what this is about?
care.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you with any questions you might have about your {{topic}}.
care.default: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you today. How can I help you?
care.style: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I’m here to answer questions you might have on our summer styles
care.end: This is as far as the demo goes. Leverage the power of the messenger platform for your business. See https://fb.me/get-sample-oc to learn how to build a similar experience

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting, You'll get the best advice here.
